popup_action_delete_user_rules.message: Delete all user rules for this site

popup_modal_all_sites_allowed_desc.message: Good job! Now AdGuard will block even more ads, dealing with the most difficult challenges!

popup_modal_not_all_sites_allowed_desc.message: You've allowed AdGuard to work only on this website, which means that it won't block ads on other websites unless you grant the permission next time.

popup_modal_desc_free.message: Mind that you miss out on advanced protection that's not available in the free version. It will help deal with more ads, including YouTube ads in Safari.

popup_fullscreen_support_title.message: Uh-oh, was that a swipe up?

popup_fullscreen_support_desc.message: If anything's wrong, let us know and we will fix it.

popup_protection_disabled_support_desc.message: Uh-oh, looks like you've disabled the protection... Is something wrong? We can fix it!

modal_protection_off_extensions.message: Tap on Safari and choose the Extensions menu item
